events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering due to your background and the position you applied for.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the interview process for the software developer role.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your experience and assess your fit for the software engineering position.
You responded promptly to our screening questions, showing enthusiasm and readiness to proceed with the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 16 at 10 AM UTC to evaluate your coding and problem-solving skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong development skills and problem-solving abilities.
Your HR interview has now been scheduled for May 19 at 3 PM UTC to discuss company culture and your career goals.
